review: I'm coming from a Raspberry Pi running Kodi to the Fire Stick... and I'm in love!  I can't BELIEVE how well it runs Kodi (formerly XBMC).  It's extremely snappy and was easy to install with all the guides out there.  Plus, you have all the other content that isn't natively on the raspberri pi.  Highly recommend for this kind of setup!
